select t.id id, -- t.tin_sn tinSn, -- 红锡膏SN t.scrap_time scrapTime, -- 报废时间 t.scrap_name scrapName, -- 报废人 t.scrap_reason scrapReason, -- 报废原因 tsi.item_code itemCode, -- 料号 a.item_name itemName, -- 名称 a.item_spec itemSpec, -- 描述 a.lead_flag leadFlag, -- 类型 tsi.doc_no docNo, -- 入库单据号 tsi.receive_name receiveName, -- 入库人 tsi.receive_time receiveTime, -- 入库时间 tsi.expire_time expireTime, -- 过期时间 tsi.area_sn areaSn, -- 区域SN tsi.create_time createTime, -- 创建时间:按当前时间自动创建 t.update_time updateTime -- 更新时间 from tin_scrap t left join tin_stock_info tsi on t.tin_sn = tsi.tin_sn left join assistant_tool a on tsi.item_code = a.item_code left join ums_supplier us on tsi.supplier_code = us.supplier_code where 1=1
and t.tin_sn LIKE '%${p.tinSn}%'
and t.scrap_time LIKE '%${p.scrapTime}%'
and t.scrap_name LIKE '%${p.scrapName}%'
and t.scrap_reason LIKE '%${p.scrapReason}%'
and tsi.item_code LIKE '%${p.itemCode}%'
and tsi.supplier_code LIKE '%${p.supplierCode}%'
and tsi.receive_time LIKE '%${p.receiveTime}%'
and tsi.doc_no LIKE '%${p.docNo}%'
and tsi.receive_name LIKE '%${p.receiveName}%'
and tsi.expire_time LIKE '%${p.expireTime}%'
and tsi.area_sn LIKE '%${p.areaSn}%'
and t.create_time >= '${p.startTime}'
and '${p.endTime}' >= t.create_time
order by t.id desc

select tsi.item_code itemCode, -- 料号 a.item_name itemName, -- 名称 a.item_spec itemSpec, -- 描述 count(1) total from tin_scrap t left join tin_stock_info tsi on t.tin_sn = tsi.tin_sn left join assistant_tool a on tsi.item_code = a.item_code left join ums_supplier us on tsi.supplier_code = us.supplier_code where 1=1
and t.tin_sn LIKE '%${p.tinSn}%'
and t.scrap_time LIKE '%${p.scrapTime}%'
and t.scrap_name LIKE '%${p.scrapName}%'
and t.scrap_reason LIKE '%${p.scrapReason}%'
and tsi.item_code LIKE '%${p.itemCode}%'
and tsi.supplier_code LIKE '%${p.supplierCode}%'
and tsi.receive_time LIKE '%${p.receiveTime}%'
and tsi.doc_no LIKE '%${p.docNo}%'
and tsi.receive_name LIKE '%${p.receiveName}%'
and tsi.expire_time LIKE '%${p.expireTime}%'
and tsi.area_sn LIKE '%${p.areaSn}%'
and t.create_time >= '${p.startTime}'
and '${p.endTime}' >= t.create_time
GROUP BY tsi.item_code
